Bio: I am a graduate with a Bachelor of Technology (B-tech) degree in Computer Science & Engineering.Currently seeking full-time Software Engineer opportunities.Please feel free to contact me on LinkedIn for any new opportunities.
Description: My name is Arif Rahaman, I am from a small town named Coochbhear. I am a graduate with a Bachelor of Technology (B-tech) degree in Computer Science & Engineering from Coochbhear Government Engineer College in 2023. I have always been passionate about technology and its applications in solving real-world problems. My expertise in Front-end Development, Backend Development, and Full stack development with the latest web technologies. I have knowledge of web development technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, Express.js, Node.js, and Tailwind CSS, which enables me to build interactive and responsive web applications.Also, I have proficiency in Python, C++, and C. I am very interested in the Software Developer role. I am constantly learning and expanding my skills to stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends.

projects.name: Talkr - Messaging Application
projects.description: A real-time web messaging application that allows users to communicate with each other instantly.

projects.name: Spotify Clone
projects.description: A responsive web application visually cloned to the Spotify app, displaying songs and playlists using the Spotify Web API.
features: Audio Playback Features (Play, Pause, Next, Previous)

projects.name: Weather Web
projects.description: Weather Web is an application to find the current weather and 5-day forecast of a given city.
features: Retrieve weather conditions of a city using Open Weather API
Display both current weather and 5-day forecast
Developed using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript

projects.name: Tabs-Saver
projects.description: It is a Chrome Extension for save brower tab and also save by input to website link.

projects.name: Water Quality Prediction of River Ganga Using ANFIS Model
projects.description: Implemented an ANFIS model and other machine learning models to predict water quality based on historical data.
